metadata.name: Di 1. Red
metadata.description:
The original photo signed by the author will be sent to the buyer after purchase. 

This is the first part of Vladislav Spivak's personal project completely filmed on polaroid and presented as NFT. 

This photos provides us with a glimpse of the private spheres of sensual women, who parade before  lens without inhibitions. Beautiful, powerful and erotic women. Through a savvy combination of carefree liberation and seduction, the models that he choses represent a female freedom while disrupting the established codes.
